summary: This document is an email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing the interview of a proposed team. The communication emphasizes confidentiality and attorney-client privilege, indicating the sensitive nature of the information shared.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is involved in a communication with Jeffrey Epstein regarding a proposed team for an interview.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, expressing a desire to interview a proposed team before it is sent to another party.

connections.description: Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein are engaged in a professional correspondence regarding team interviews.

keyFacts: The email emphasizes confidentiality and may contain attorney-client privileged information.
Jeffrey Epstein expresses a desire to interview a proposed team before it is sent to another party.
